title: 召集所有讀sports psychology 巴/絲 求救

replies.msg: 有冇人知道咩叫organizational psychology 呢排有份功課係關於sports psychology 標題係"overview of the emergence of organizational psychology and critically apparaise its use for understanding performance in elite sport

其實organizational psychology全名叫industrial-organizational psychology (簡稱IO psyc)，主要係講緊人係workplace入面既行為，例如係team work，leadership，motivation，how to handle stress咁樣。
巴打如果睇你話拉到落sports psyc/elite sport，可以探討下班運動員有咩motivation繼續做elite，如果係team sports可以講下佢地d team goals，team stress咁。

利申：冇讀過sports psyc
